com.jcabi.xml

Class XPathContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.xml.XPathContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamespaceContext

    public final class XPathContext
extends Object
implements NamespaceContext
    Convenient internal implementation of NamespaceContext.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • XPathContext

        public XPathContext()
        Public ctor.

        Since this class is private in the package users won't be able to see this code and its documentation. That's why all these prefixes and namespaces should be documented in XMLDocument.XMLDocument(String) ctor. When adding/changing this list - don't forget to document it there.
